attribute.name: action
attribute.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property.

attribute.name: actionListener
attribute.description: MethodBinding pointing at method acception an ActionEvent with return type void.

attribute.name: immediate
attribute.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.
